kickstart.description: Intended to be run after postshell. Will re-source the probed-ethers.sh and then regenerate configs for the network interfaces, modprobe.conf. ethers-server.xml will have probed the interfaces to create probed-ethers.sh. A user can put "postshell" on the command line and then edit probed-ethers.sh to arbitrarily re-assign mac:interface definitions.
